metadata.description: Major 765kV, 500kV, 345kV, and 230kV substations in the Eastern Interconnection with EIA-860 generator data
metadata.coverage: Eastern US - comprehensive transmission nodes covering PJM, MISO, SPP, NYISO, ISO-NE, and SERC regions
metadata.notes: Phase A - High voltage substations covering major load centers and generation hubs. Generator fuel_type field added per EIA-860 specifications.

interconnection.name: Eastern Interconnection
interconnection.description: Eastern Interconnection covering states east of the Rocky Mountains, excluding Texas (ERCOT)
